ACCURATE: Accurate weapons are easier to aim or wield, whether through design or technology. For each level of this trait, the attacker adds â€¢ to his attack dice pools while using this weapon.
CONCUSSIVE: The weapon's attack can leave the target shell-shocked from mighty blows or punishing Shockwaves, unable to perform any but the most basic actions. The target is staggered (see page 218) for a number of rounds equal to the weapon's Concussive rating. A staggered target cannot perform actions.
